entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023
